title: When I change the home screen layout, why do some widgets disappear?
answer: This is part of the design of the EMUI platform. The EMUI platform has the following rules for widgets and icons when changing the home screen layout: Icons and widgets will be rearranged after the layout is changed to grid. Icons for applications that will no longer fit on the home screen will be put into a folder. Widgets that will not fit will be removed.
